comment: Eliminate the expression ` { x | x e. A } ` in ~ df-ixp , under the assumption that ` A ` and ` x ` are disjoint. This way, we can say that ` x ` is bound in ` X_ x e. A B ` even if it appears free in ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2016.)
